DOC.brief_summary: The investigator test hypothesis LOW CARB hypocaloric diet reduce body weight six month LOW FAT hypocaloric diet . In addition body weight , investigator measure cardiovascular metabolic variable take blood sample order determine whether certain metabolite may predict diet success .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Low Fat Low Carbohydrate Diets With Respect Weight Loss Metabolic Effects
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index > 27 kg/m2 No chronic medication ( except oral contraceptive LThyroxine ) possibility stop medication study duration Able give write informed consent Pregnancy nursing Severe cardiovascular , liver , kidney , hepatic orthopedic disease need treatment Metabolic endocrine disease need treatment Hypertension blood pressure > 160/95 mmHg need > 2 drug Previous stroke cerebral ischemia Significant neurologic psychiatric disease Any kind eat disorder Bariatric surgery past Drug alcohol abuse Any cancer past Acute chronic infection Metallic implant ( e.g . pace maker ) condition allow MRI scan Body weight > 130 kg
